title: Geth 1.7.0 - got eth.blockNumber but not getting eth.syncing
body:
Hi all

I am getting a reply on the eth.blockNumber but no longer getting reply on eth.syncing - I read in earlier post that once you get the importing chain segment every 14 seconds you are synced !! is this true?

thanks in advance

Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

coinbase: 0x9ca8c0cf47576208c5b017d9a560ed33d84f2267

INFO [09-28|15:42:31] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=40  mgas=2.307  elapsed=172.454ms mgasps=13.380 number=4319294 hash=e7e270…0fb4c3
INFO [09-28|15:42:41] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=42  mgas=1.187  elapsed=245.080ms mgasps=4.844  number=4319295 hash=051111…1cc44b

The fragment that you posted indicates that you did get a reply on `eth.syncing`, but it turned false. That is a good thing because you get either `false` which is an indication that your node has caught up with the chain, or a bunch of numbers indications how the synchronisation process is progressing. In the log that you posted you can see that your node is imported blocks one at a time which is usually also a good indication that your node has caught up with the chain and only imports new created blocks.

So everything is fine.

thanks a lot for your help - im closing the ticket now .
best regards
A
